DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy ice pack topical eutectic mixture local anesthesia ( EMLA ) pain control diode 810 nm laser axillary hair removal . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Ice Versus EMLA Pain Laser Hair Removal
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Subjects Caucasian Asian female . 2 . Subjects 1865 year old . 3 . Subjects Fitzpatrick skin type IIII coarse dark axillary hair . 4 . Subjects good health . 5 . Subjects provide informed consent . 6 . Subjects willingness ability understand communicate investigator . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subjects allergic lidocaine prilocaine . 2 . History methemoglobinemia . 3 . History recurrent petechial purpuric lesion . 4 . Bleeding tendency coagulopathy . 5 . History laser treatment axilla . 6 . History keloid hypertrophic scarring . 7 . Pregnant lactate intend become pregnant next 3 month . 8 . Active skin disease skin infection treatment area . 9 . Subjects know mental illness psychological condition , psychotic disorder , mood disorder , anxiety disorder cognitive disorder . 10 . History cold urticaria . 11 . History current injury abnormal skin sensation . 12 . Unable understand protocol give inform consent . 13 . Any condition would , professional opinion investigator , potentially affect response participation clinical clinical study , would pose unacceptable risk subject .
